long_description: The compact Canine Hardware Travel Bed gives your pooch a comfortable place to sleep while protecting your upholstery at home and on the road. Polyester microfiber on top offers a soft and suede feel; durable ripstop nylon cover on bottom. Machine washable design features double offset quilting throughout that eliminates material separating and shifting during the laundering process-no clumps! Canine Hardware Travel Bed comes with a 9 x 15 in. nylon stuff sack.
short_description: The compact Canine Hardware Travel Bed gives your pooch a comfortable place to sleep while protecting your upholstery at home and on the road.
